full_summary:
# Fitness Equipment Tender Notice
## Background
The government is seeking offers to provide various fitness equipment for the Department of National Defence (DND) located in Lancaster Park, Alberta.

## Tender Information
### Solicitation Number
WS4399110846

### Tender Category
GSIN: 49200000 - Fitness Equipment

### Procurement Method
Competitive - Open bidding

### Selection Criteria
The lowest price will be used to determine the selected bid.

### Trade Agreements
This tender is subject to the following trade agreements:
* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
* World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
* Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA)
* Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
* Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)

## Tender Details
### Tender Closing Date
2024-07-19T14:00:00 EST

### Expected Contract Start Date
2024-10-10

### Expected Contract End Date
2025-06-02

### Place of Delivery
Edmonton, Alberta

## Contact Information
### Name
Gerlie Ramos
### Title
SPAC/PSPC
### Email
gerlie.ramos@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

## Tender Documents
* Please disregard the Ariba Discovery posting response deadline closing time and CanadaBuys posting closing time.
* All required supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted by 2024-07-19 at 14:00 EST.
* All bids submitted after 14:00 EST will result in the bid being declared non-responsive.
* The tender document can be found at: https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/19857276. have a nice day
